text.section:
The Fund Director may not:
Be an officer or director of any State or federal savings and loan association; or
Engage in any other business relating to financial institutions.

section.section: The Fund Director may not own stock or be a depositor in any member association.
The employees of the Fund may not own stock in any member association.

text.section: Any person who violates any provision of this section is subject to dismissal.
